name: Stairs (itch) (Em648)
description:
(FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING)

The arrow keys are used to move around.

This game is about exploring. You walk around strange areas with bizarre scenery, you may encounter some characters and puzzles along the way. I think the game is best left to explain itself. Making things like this means a lot to me so I hope you enjoy it! This game is free to play and was made in Pico-8.

I recommend downloading the game since I find the html embed makes the colours look a bit off and the display blurry.
